## A Look into our data
    -Basically it has 9 columns to concern
    1. Name of the Company
    2. Platform for that video game
    3. Year of release
    4. Genre of the game
    5. Its Publisher
    6. Sale of that game in Millions in 
        a. Europe
        b. Japan
        c. NewYork
        d. Other part of the world.
